first_edit.name: First Touch
first_edit.description: Edit a file with Claude's help
first_edit.tip: Be specific: instead of 'fix the bug', say 'fix the TypeError in login.js line 42'

first_write.name: Creator
first_write.tip: Claude can create entire files from description. Try: 'Create a React component for a login form'

claude_md_creator.name: Project Curator
claude_md_creator.tip: CLAUDE.md helps Claude understand your project. Include: tech stack, coding style, important files, and common commands.

plan_mode_user.name: Strategic Thinker
plan_mode_user.description: Use Plan mode for complex tasks
plan_mode_user.tip: Press Shift+Tab twice to enter Plan mode. Great for architecture decisions and multi-step tasks.

git_commit.name: Version Controller
git_commit.tip: Let Claude write commit messages! It reads your changes and writes meaningful conventional commits.

git_push.name: Ship It!
git_push.tip: Always review changes before pushing. Ask Claude to summarize what will be pushed.

run_tests.name: Quality Guardian
run_tests.tip: Ask Claude: 'Run the tests and fix any failures'. This is the vibecoding verification loop!

multi_agent.name: Delegation Master
multi_agent.description: Use Task tool to spawn sub-agents
multi_agent.tip: Task tool creates specialized agents for complex work. Great for parallel exploration.

first_mcp.name: MCP Pioneer
first_mcp.tip: MCP extends Claude's abilities. Connect to databases, APIs, or custom tools.

web_searcher.name: Web Explorer
web_searcher.tip: Claude can search for latest docs, solutions, and APIs.

hooks_user.name: Automation Architect
hooks_user.tip: Hooks run scripts on events. Use them for linting, testing, or custom workflows.

ralph_starter.name: Loop Master
ralph_starter.tip: Ralph Loop lets Claude work autonomously until a goal is met. Great for complex refactoring!

mcp_connector.name: MCP Connector
mcp_connector.tip: Create .mcp.json to connect Claude to external tools like databases, APIs, or custom services.

skill_creator.name: Skill Creator
skill_creator.tip: Skills in .claude/skills/ provide domain-specific knowledge. Add name and description frontmatter.

command_crafter.name: Command Crafter
command_crafter.tip: Create .md files in .claude/commands/ to add your own /commands with custom workflows.

agent_architect.name: Agent Architect
agent_architect.tip: Agents in .claude/agents/ are specialized AI assistants for specific tasks like code review.

visual_inspector.name: Visual Inspector
visual_inspector.tip: Claude can read images! Use it to analyze screenshots, diagrams, or UI mockups.

global_curator.name: Global Curator
global_curator.tip: ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md applies to ALL projects. Add your coding style and preferences.

cicd_pioneer.name: CI/CD Pioneer
cicd_pioneer.tip: Let Claude set up your CI/CD pipelines in .github/workflows/.

doc_hunter.name: Doc Hunter
doc_hunter.description: Fetch and analyze a web page
doc_hunter.tip: WebFetch reads any URL. Great for checking docs, APIs, or extracting info from websites.

task_planner.name: Task Planner
task_planner.tip: TodoWrite helps Claude track complex multi-step tasks. Great for large features!

code_detective.name: Code Detective
code_detective.description: Search codebase with Glob or Grep
code_detective.tip: Glob finds files by pattern, Grep searches content. Faster than manual searching!

security_guard.name: Security Guard
security_guard.tip: Set allowedTools/disallowedTools in settings to control what Claude can access.

communicator.name: Communicator
communicator.description: Ask clarifying questions to the user
communicator.tip: Claude can ask you questions mid-task! Great for clarifying requirements or choosing between options.

plugin_installer.name: Plugin Explorer
plugin_installer.description: Install a plugin from the marketplace
plugin_installer.tip: Use /plugin to browse and install from claude-plugins-official. Extend Claude's capabilities!
